# Problem 1
```{r}
homicide_wp = 
  read_csv(
    "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/washingtonpost/data-homicides/master/homicide-data.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(city_state = str_c(city, state, sep = ", ")) %>%
  mutate(solved = ifelse(disposition == "Closed by arrest", "solved", "not solved")) %>% 
  filter(!city_state == "Dallas, TX", !city_state == "Phoenix, AZ", !city_state == "Kansas City, MO", !city_state == "Tulsa, AL") %>% 
  
  mutate(victim_race = ifelse(victim_race == "White", "White", "Non-White"),
  fct_relevel(victim_race, "White", "Non-White")) %>% 
  mutate(as.numeric(victim_age))

#Need to still make victim age numeric
```
